td.div: English: The pre-1801 Union Flag (of w:United Kingdom of Great Britain).
Français : Drapeau du Royaume-Uni de Grande-Bretagne.

ul.li: Sodipodi flag collection (original file) Dead link as of: 4FEB2009
Colours: vexilla mundi Dead link as of: 12DEC2007

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.p: This work is in the public domain in its country of origin and other countries and areas where the copyright term is the author's life plus 100 years or fewer.
This work is in the public domain in the United States because it was published (or registered with the U.S. Copyright Office) before January 1, 1927.

td.a: This file has been identified as being free of known restrictions under copyright law, including all related and neighboring rights.

tr.td: iThe source code of this SVG is valid.

span.span: This vector image was created with Adobe Illustrator.

current20:58, 28 January 20211,000 × 600 (402 bytes)Fry1989 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 18:35, 30 July 2020 (UTC)
09:15, 28 January 20211,200 × 600 (2 KB)LMgamer36 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 08:58, 8 October 2013 (UTC)
18:35, 30 July 20201,000 × 600 (402 bytes)Illegitimate Barrister (talk | contribs)Reducing size
22:09, 28 May 2020512 × 307 (596 bytes)AtomicMario (talk | contribs)Proper colors, made from scratch in Adobe Illustrator
04:33, 19 February 20161,000 × 600 (402 bytes)Alkari (talk | contribs)reverted – so-called "brand guidelines" are bogus and unofficial
02:00, 19 February 20161,000 × 600 (402 bytes)Corkythehornetfan (talk | contribs)brand guidelines // Editing SVG source code using User:Rillke/SVGedit.js; upload handled by User:Rillke/MwJSBot.js
18:52, 8 October 20131,000 × 600 (402 bytes)Fry1989 (talk | contribs)Please explain different colours
16:26, 8 October 20131,000 × 600 (2 KB)Autohome (talk | contribs)fix colours
16:16, 8 October 20131,000 × 600 (402 bytes)Autohome (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 20:56, 15 January 2012
08:58, 8 October 20131,200 × 600 (2 KB)Autohome (talk | contribs)proportions fixed (and made it ratio 1:2), based on Image:Flag of the United Kingdom.svg

div.p: View more global usage of this file.

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
